entities.name: Articque
entities.description: Target company whose enhanced architecture is being shaped up, as detailed in Project Inuk. Offers the Cartes & Données / Articque Platform and related modules and services.

entities.transactionPerimeter: Involves Articque and ChapsVision. Focuses on shaping Articque's enhanced architecture.

entities.name: Cartes & Données / Articque Platform
entities.description: Core platform offered by Articque. It integrates various data sources (like key account information via DataComposer) and provides functionalities through its Web Application and Web Service C&D components. Can be extended with additional modules like Geocoding, Geoservice Data, and Map backgrounds.

entities.name: Web Application
entities.description: User-facing component of the Articque Platform, featuring a Frontend (built with DataViz, React JS, JavaScript) and a Backend (PHP, Apache, Symfony). It interacts with users and connects to the Web Service C&D via a Proxy.

entities.name: Web Service C&D
entities.description: Backend service component of the Articque Platform, built on .NET Framework. It utilizes Articque Library, C&D Library, and C&D API to provide core Cartes & Données functionalities.

entities.name: Geocoding
entities.description: Additional module for the Cartes & Données / Articque Platform.

entities.name: Geoservice Data
entities.description: Additional module for the Cartes & Données / Articque Platform.

entities.name: Map backgrounds
entities.description: Additional module for the Cartes & Données / Articque Platform.

entities.name: DataComposer
entities.description: Extract-Transform-Load tool used in Articque's architecture.

entities.name: DataViz
entities.description: Web graphic rendering tool used in the frontend of Articque's Web Application.

entities.name: Key account information management
entities.description: Management and utilization of key account data, serving as a primary data input for Articque's platform, often stored in MySQL or PostgreSQL databases.
